abstract: Catalan protesters surge through streets of Barcelona and four Catalonian cities to pressure leaders to secede from Spain; protests take place amid serious political deadlock in Spain.

headline.print_headline: With Spain in Political Deadlock, Catalans Renew Their Calls for Independence
headline.main: With Spain in Political Deadlock, Catalans Renew Calls for Independence

snippet: Hundreds of thousands took to the streets of Barcelona and four other cities to urge their leaders to push for separation from Spain....
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands took to the streets of Barcelona and four other cities to urge their leaders to push for separation from Spain.
